properties.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 6 at 5:17AM AKST until January 7 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulation 5 to 10 inches with
locally higher amounts.

* WHERE...Juneau and Douglas.

* WHEN...Noon Monday through 6 AM Tuesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Heavy snow may be difficult
to manage.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will intensify late this afternoon and
will affect the evening commute. Heavy snow will persist through
Monday night. There is a chance that heavy snow could persist
into Tuesday, but currently is forecasted to ease. Snow totals
may vary significantly over short distances.
properties.instruction:
An advisory means that a potentially hazardous event is already
occurring or imminent. Driving may be hazardous and the Tuesday
morning commute may be adversely impacted.

A warning means that a winter storm is already occurring or
imminent. This storm could pose a threat to life and property.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM AKST TUESDAY
